meanings.sent1: She stood erectly during the national anthem.
meanings.sent2: The flagpole was planted erectly in the ground.
meanings.sent3: The scarecrow stood so erectly that it seemed to be guarding the field.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper rose erectly into the sky, dominating the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The soldier saluted erectly, showing respect and discipline.

meanings.definition: In a straight and vertical manner
meanings.sent1: The tree grew erectly towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The architect ensured the walls were built erectly to support the structure.
meanings.sent3: The pencil stood erectly on the edge of the table, defying gravity.
meanings.sent4: The rocket shot erectly into the atmosphere, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
meanings.sent5: The pole vaulter launched himself erectly over the bar, clearing it effortlessly.
